movie.title: Sky Tour: The Movie
movie.description_intro: From the preparations to the performances, this documentary showcases Vietnamese pop idol Son Tung M-TP and the passion behind his Sky Tour concerts.
movie.description_full: From the preparations to the performances, this documentary showcases Vietnamese pop idol Son Tung M-TP and the passion behind his Sky Tour concerts.

movies.title: The Nth Ward
movies.summary: An engineer with the US Army Corps is sent to New Orleans after the hurricane the assess the damage. Bizarre happenings and disappearances lead her down a path of political deceit and voodoo.
movies.description_full: An engineer with the US Army Corps is sent to New Orleans after the hurricane the assess the damage. Bizarre happenings and disappearances lead her down a path of political deceit and voodoo.

movies.title: Meet the Browns
movies.summary: A single mom takes her family to Georgia for the funeral of her father -- a man she never met. There, her clan is introduced to the crass, fun-loving Brown family.
movies.description_full: A single mom takes her family to Georgia for the funeral of her father -- a man she never met. There, her clan is introduced to the crass, fun-loving Brown family.

movies.title: Room 37: The Mysterious Death of Johnny Thunders
movies.title_english: Room 37: The Mysterious Death of Johnny Thunders
movies.title_long: Room 37: The Mysterious Death of Johnny Thunders (2019)
movies.summary: Famed rock and roll guitarist Johnny Thunders arrives in New Orleans to get his life together after a toll of hardships, but instead falls into a dark journey and trail of events that are based on his real life unexplained mysterious death.
movies.description_full: Famed rock and roll guitarist Johnny Thunders arrives in New Orleans to get his life together after a toll of hardships, but instead falls into a dark journey and trail of events that are based on his real life unexplained mysterious death.
movies.synopsis: Famed rock and roll guitarist Johnny Thunders arrives in New Orleans to get his life together after a toll of hardships, but instead falls into a dark journey and trail of events that are based on his real life unexplained mysterious death.

movies.title: The Truth of Our Marriage
movies.summary: Francois Donge, a wealthy manufacturer, is fighting death at hospital. He officially suffers from a food poisoning. But actually, his wife Bebe deliberately poisoned him. Flashback: ten years before, Francois meets Bebe. He is already wealthy, and has many affairs. She is an idealistic young woman. He is thinking of taking a wife, she is looking for love...
